name: Bob
overview: BOB (Bipedal something something) brings your lab to life through virtual reality. Strap on a headset and instantly see, hear, and feel what BOB experiences

details.title: True bipedal mobility
details.text: Powered by a neural‑network controller trained in a custom physics simulator, BOB learns to walk, turn, and balance in any direction—just like a human.

details.title: Mirrored manipulation
details.text: Your hand movements guide BOB’s dexterous actuators in real time, letting you handle tools, flip switches, or explore hard‑to‑reach places without leaving your chair.

details.title: Immersive feedback
details.text: A high‑resolution stereo camera pair and spatial audio suite deliver crystal‑clear visuals and sound, so you can inspect experiments from a safe distance or collaborate remotely as if you were there.

footer: Whether you’re testing new walking gaits, exploring destructive environments, or simply experiencing lab life from afar, BOB’s VR‑driven design opens up a world of possibilities—no boundaries, just exploration.
